items.title: AztecCode.Save
items.summary:
Saves Aztec to a file based on extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.BarcodeDecodeOptions

items.title: BarcodeDecodeOptions.WithCode39Checksum
items.summary: Sets Code39 checksum handling.

items.summary: Sets MSI checksum handling.

items.title: BarcodeDecodeOptions.WithCode11Checksum
items.summary: Sets Code 11 checksum handling.

items.title: BarcodeDecodeOptions.WithPlesseyChecksum
items.summary: Sets Plessey CRC handling.

items.title: BarcodeDecodeOptions.WithTileScan
items.summary: Enables or disables tile scanning for multiple barcodes.

items.title: BarcodeDecodeOptions.Code39Checksum
items.summary: Controls how Code39 checksum characters are handled during decode.

items.title: BarcodeDecodeOptions.MsiChecksum
items.summary: Controls how MSI checksum digits are handled during decode.

items.title: BarcodeDecodeOptions.Code11Checksum
items.summary: Controls how Code 11 checksum characters are handled during decode.

items.title: BarcodeDecodeOptions.PlesseyChecksum
items.summary: Controls whether Plessey CRC validation is required during decode.

items.title: BarcodeDecodeOptions.EnableTileScan
items.summary: Enables tile-based scanning for multiple barcodes in one image.

items.title: BarcodeDecodeOptions.TileGrid
items.summary: Tile grid size for multi-scan (0 = auto, 2..4 recommended).

items.title: CodeGlyphX.Code11ChecksumPolicy
items.summary: Policy for handling optional Code 11 checksum characters.

items.title: Code11ChecksumPolicy.None
items.summary: Do not strip checksum characters (default, avoids accidental data loss).

items.title: Code11ChecksumPolicy.StripIfValid
items.summary: Strip trailing checksum character(s) when valid.

items.title: Code11ChecksumPolicy.RequireValid
items.summary: Require valid checksum character(s); otherwise decoding fails.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.Code39ChecksumPolicy
items.summary: Policy for handling optional Code39 checksum characters.

items.title: Code39ChecksumPolicy.None
items.summary: Do not strip checksum characters (default, avoids accidental data loss).

items.title: Code39ChecksumPolicy.StripIfValid
items.summary: Strip the trailing character if it matches a valid checksum.

items.title: Code39ChecksumPolicy.RequireValid
items.summary: Require a valid checksum and strip it; otherwise decoding fails.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.CodeGlyphDecodeOptions
items.summary: Options for unified QR/barcode decoding.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Screen
items.summary: Screen preset (budgeted decode for UI capture scenarios).

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Fast
items.summary: Fast preset (lower accuracy, fewer transforms).

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Balanced
items.summary: Balanced preset (good default for most images).

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Robust
items.summary: Robust preset (best accuracy, slower).

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Stylized
items.summary: Stylized preset (adds aggressive sampling for QR art).

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.WithBarcode
items.summary: Configures barcode decode options fluently.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.WithQr
items.summary: Configures QR decode options fluently.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.WithImage
items.summary: Configures image decode options fluently.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.WithExpectedBarcode
items.summary: Sets the expected barcode type.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.PreferBarcodeFirst
items.summary: Prefer trying barcodes before 2D codes.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.IncludeBarcodeResults
items.summary: Include 1D barcode results when decoding multiple symbols.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.WithCancellation
items.summary: Sets a cancellation token for decoding.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.WithQrBudget
items.summary: Applies a QR decode budget (milliseconds + optional max dimension).

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.WithImageBudget
items.summary: Applies a non-QR image decode budget (milliseconds + optional max dimension).

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.WithQrProfile
items.summary: Sets the QR profile for this decode.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.WithQrMaxScale
items.summary: Overrides maximum QR scale.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.WithAggressiveQrSampling
items.summary: Enables aggressive QR sampling.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.ExpectedBarcode
items.summary: Expected barcode type (optional hint for 1D decoding).

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Barcode
items.summary: Options for 1D barcode decoding.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Code39Checksum
items.summary: Controls how Code39 checksum characters are handled during decode.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MsiChecksum
items.summary: Controls how MSI checksum digits are handled during decode.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Code11Checksum
items.summary: Controls how Code 11 checksum characters are handled during decode.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.PlesseyChecksum
items.summary: Controls whether Plessey CRC validation is required during decode.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.PreferBarcode
items.summary: Prefer trying barcodes before 2D codes.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.IncludeBarcode
items.summary: Include 1D barcode results when decoding multiple symbols.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Qr
items.summary: QR decode options (profile, budget, etc.).

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Image
items.summary: Image decode options for non-QR symbols.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.Profile
items.summary: Speed/accuracy profile for QR pixel decoding (default: Robust).

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MaxDimension
items.summary:
Maximum dimension (pixels) for QR decoding. Larger inputs will be downscaled by sampling.
 Set to 0 to disable.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MaxScale
items.summary: Maximum scale to try when decoding QR (1..8). Set to 0 to use profile defaults.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MaxMilliseconds
items.summary: Maximum milliseconds to spend decoding QR (best effort). Set to 0 to disable.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.DisableTransforms
items.summary: Disable rotation/mirroring attempts for QR decoding, even in robust profiles.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.AggressiveSampling
items.summary: Enables extra thresholding/sampling passes for stylized or noisy QR codes (slower).

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MaxImageDimension
items.summary:
Maximum image dimension (pixels) for non-QR decoding. Larger inputs will be downscaled.
 Set to 0 to disable.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.MaxImageMilliseconds
items.summary: Maximum milliseconds to spend decoding non-QR symbols (best effort). Set to 0 to disable.

items.title: CodeGlyphDecodeOptions.CancellationToken
items.summary: Cancellation token for decoding.

 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.DataMatrixDecodeDiagnostics
items.summary: Diagnostics for Data Matrix decoding.

items.title: DataMatrixDecodeDiagnostics.AttemptCount
items.summary: Number of decode attempts (rotations + mirror).

items.title: DataMatrixDecodeDiagnostics.MirroredTried
items.summary: True when mirrored decode was attempted.

items.title: DataMatrixDecodeDiagnostics.Success
items.summary: True when decode succeeded.

items.title: DataMatrixDecodeDiagnostics.Failure
items.summary: Optional failure message when decoding fails.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.DecodeBatchDiagnostics
items.summary: Aggregated diagnostics for a batch decode run.

items.title: DecodeBatchDiagnostics.Total
items.summary: Gets total number of inputs processed.

items.title: DecodeBatchDiagnostics.Success
items.summary: Gets the number of successful decodes.

items.title: DecodeBatchDiagnostics.InvalidInput
items.summary: Gets the number of invalid input failures.

items.title: DecodeBatchDiagnostics.UnsupportedFormat
items.summary: Gets the number of unsupported format failures.

items.title: DecodeBatchDiagnostics.Cancelled
items.summary: Gets the number of cancelled decodes.

items.title: DecodeBatchDiagnostics.NoResult
items.summary: Gets the number of no-result decodes.

items.title: DecodeBatchDiagnostics.Error
items.summary: Gets the number of unexpected errors.

items.title: DecodeBatchDiagnostics.TotalElapsed
items.summary: Gets the total elapsed time across all items.

items.title: DecodeBatchDiagnostics.FailureCount
items.summary: Gets the number of failed decodes.

items.title: DecodeBatchDiagnostics.AverageElapsed
items.summary: Gets the average elapsed time per item.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.DecodeFailureReason
items.summary: Describes why decoding failed.

items.title: DecodeFailureReason.None
items.summary: No failure (success).

items.title: DecodeFailureReason.InvalidInput
items.summary: Input was invalid.

items.title: DecodeFailureReason.UnsupportedFormat
items.summary: Image format or data was not supported.

items.title: DecodeFailureReason.Cancelled
items.summary: Operation was cancelled.

items.title: DecodeFailureReason.NoResult
items.summary: Decoding completed but no symbols were found.

items.title: DecodeFailureReason.Error
items.summary: An unexpected error occurred.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.Gs1
items.summary: Helpers for building and encoding GS1 element strings (GS1-128).

items.title: Gs1.ElementString
items.summary:
Builds a GS1 element string from an AI string like (01)09506000134352(10)ABC(17)240101.
 Unknown AIs are treated as variable length; use | or GroupSeparator in the input to force a separator.

items.title: Gs1.ElementString
items.summary: Builds a GS1 element string from explicit elements.

items.title: Gs1.Encode128
items.summary: Encodes a GS1-128 barcode from an AI string (parentheses format or raw element string).

items.title: Gs1.Encode128
items.summary: Encodes a GS1-128 barcode from explicit elements.

items.title: Gs1.GroupSeparator
items.summary: ASCII Group Separator (FNC1) used between variable-length GS1 elements.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.Gs1Element
items.summary: Represents a GS1 element (AI + data) with explicit length semantics.

items.title: Gs1Element.Fixed
items.summary: Creates a fixed-length GS1 element.

items.title: Gs1Element.Variable
items.summary: Creates a variable-length GS1 element.

items.title: Gs1Element.Ai
items.summary: Application Identifier.

items.title: Gs1Element.Data
items.summary: Data associated with the AI.

items.title: Gs1Element.IsVariableLength
items.summary: Indicates whether the element is variable length.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.Otp.HotpBuilder
items.summary: Fluent HOTP builder.

items.title: HotpBuilder.WithOptions
items.summary: Updates rendering options.

items.title: HotpBuilder.WithParameters
items.summary: Sets algorithm and digits.

items.title: HotpBuilder.Uri
items.summary: Builds the otpauth URI.

items.title: HotpBuilder.Encode
items.summary: Encodes the QR code.

items.title: HotpBuilder.Png
items.summary: Renders PNG bytes.

items.title: HotpBuilder.Svg
items.summary: Renders SVG text.

items.title: HotpBuilder.Html
items.summary: Renders HTML text.

items.title: HotpBuilder.Jpeg
items.summary: Renders JPEG bytes.

items.title: HotpBuilder.SavePng
items.summary: Saves PNG to a file.

items.title: Pdf417Code.SaveMacro

 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.

items.title: Pdf417Code.Save
items.summary:
Saves PDF417 to a file based on extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.

items.title: Pdf417Code.Save
items.summary:
Saves PDF417 to a file for byte payloads based on extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.PlesseyChecksumPolicy

items.summary: Do not validate CRC.

items.summary: Validate CRC and ignore mismatches.

items.summary: Require valid CRC; otherwise decoding fails.

 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.

items.title: QR.SaveAuto
items.summary:
Detects a payload type and saves a QR code to a file based on the file extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.

items.title: QR.Save
items.summary:
Saves a QR code to a file based on the file extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrArtSafety
items.summary: Evaluates QR art/render options for scan safety.

items.title: QrArtSafety.Evaluate
items.summary: Evaluates a QR render configuration.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrArtSafetyReport
items.summary: Safety score and warnings for QR art/custom styling.

items.title: QrArtSafetyReport.Score
items.summary: Safety score (0..100).

items.title: QrArtSafetyReport.Warnings
items.summary: Warnings detected for the render options.

items.title: QrArtSafetyReport.IsSafe
items.summary: Indicates whether the configuration is likely safe for scanning.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrArtWarning
items.summary: QR art warning with a short message.

items.summary: Creates a warning entry.

items.title: QrArtWarning.Kind
items.summary: Warning kind.

items.title: QrArtWarning.Message
items.summary: Warning message.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrArtWarningKind
items.summary: Warning kinds for QR art safety evaluation.

items.title: QrArtWarningKind.QuietZoneTooSmall
items.summary: Quiet zone is below the recommended size (4 modules).

items.title: QrArtWarningKind.ModuleSizeTooSmall
items.summary: Module size is too small for reliable scanning.

items.title: QrArtWarningKind.LowContrast
items.summary: Contrast between foreground and background is too low.

items.title: QrArtWarningKind.LowContrastGradient
items.summary: Gradient includes colors with low contrast against the background.

items.title: QrArtWarningKind.ModuleScaleTooSmall
items.summary: Module scale is too small (excessive rounding or shrink).

items.title: QrArtWarningKind.LogoTooLarge
items.summary: Logo covers too much of the QR area.

items.title: QrArtWarningKind.LogoNeedsHighEcc
items.summary: Logo is used with low error correction.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrCode
items.summary: A generated QR code (modules + metadata).

items.title: QrCode.QrCode
items.summary: Creates a new CodeGlyphX.QrCode.

items.title: QrCode.Version
items.summary: Gets the QR version (1..40).

items.title: QrCode.ErrorCorrectionLevel
items.summary: Gets the error correction level used for encoding.

items.title: QrCode.Mask
items.summary: Gets the selected mask pattern (0..7).

items.title: QrCode.Modules
items.summary: Gets the QR modules (dark = true, light = false), without quiet zone.

items.title: QrCode.Size
items.summary: Gets the module matrix size (width/height), i.e. Version * 4 + 17.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrCodeEncoder
items.summary: Encodes QR codes (byte mode + optional Kanji mode).

items.title: QrCodeEncoder.EncodeText
items.summary: Encodes a UTF-8 text payload as a QR code.

items.title: QrCodeEncoder.EncodeText
items.summary: Encodes a text payload using a specific QR text encoding (optionally with ECI).

items.title: QrCodeEncoder.EncodeKanji
items.summary: Encodes a QR Kanji-mode payload (Shift-JIS JIS X 0208).

items.title: QrCodeEncoder.EncodeBytes
items.summary: Encodes an arbitrary byte payload (QR byte mode).

items.title: QrCodeEncoder.EncodeBytes
items.summary: Encodes an arbitrary byte payload (QR byte mode).

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrDecoded
items.summary: Result of decoding a QR code payload.

items.title: QrDecoded.Version
items.summary: Gets the decoded QR version (1..40).

items.title: QrDecoded.ErrorCorrectionLevel
items.summary: Gets the decoded error correction level.

items.title: QrDecoded.Mask
items.summary: Gets the decoded mask pattern (0..7).

items.title: QrDecoded.Bytes
items.summary: Gets the decoded payload bytes.

items.title: QrDecoded.Text
items.summary: Gets the decoded payload interpreted as text (ISO-8859-1 by default; respects ECI per segment).

items.title: QrDecoded.StructuredAppend
items.summary: Structured append metadata when the payload participates in a multi-symbol sequence.

items.title: QrDecoded.Fnc1Mode
items.summary: Indicates whether the payload uses FNC1 (GS1) mode.

items.title: QrDecoded.Parsed
items.summary: Gets the parsed payload when recognized (URL, WiFi, contact, etc.).

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrDecodeFailureReason
items.summary: High-level failure reasons for QR decoding.

items.title: QrDecodeFailureReason.None
items.summary: No failure (decode succeeded).

items.title: QrDecodeFailureReason.InvalidInput
items.summary: Invalid input (null, non-square, or too small buffers).

items.title: QrDecodeFailureReason.InvalidSize
items.summary: Invalid module size or version.

items.title: QrDecodeFailureReason.FormatInfo
items.summary: Format information could not be recovered.

items.title: QrDecodeFailureReason.ReedSolomon
items.summary: Reed-Solomon error correction failed.

items.title: QrDecodeFailureReason.Payload
items.summary: Payload parsing failed.

items.title: QrDecodeFailureReason.Cancelled
items.summary: Decoding was cancelled.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrDecodeInfo
items.summary: Diagnostics returned by QR decoding attempts.

items.title: QrDecodeInfo.Failure
items.summary: Gets the failure reason.

items.title: QrDecodeInfo.Version
items.summary: Gets the decoded QR version (1..40) when available.

items.title: QrDecodeInfo.ErrorCorrectionLevel
items.summary: Gets the error correction level when available.

items.title: QrDecodeInfo.Mask
items.summary: Gets the mask pattern index when available.

items.title: QrDecodeInfo.FormatBestDistance
items.summary: Gets the best distance to a format pattern (lower is better).

items.title: QrDecodeInfo.IsSuccess
items.summary: Gets a value indicating whether decoding succeeded.

items.title: QrDecodeInfo.Message
items.summary: Gets a human-friendly message describing the failure.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrDecodeProfile
items.summary: Speed/accuracy profile for pixel-based QR decoding.

items.title: QrDecodeProfile.Fast
items.summary: Fastest path (minimal thresholds, no transforms).

items.title: QrDecodeProfile.Balanced
items.summary: Balanced speed/robustness.

items.title: QrDecodeProfile.Robust
items.summary: Most robust path (more thresholds, transforms, and scales).

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions
items.summary: Simple options for QR rendering.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.ModuleSize
items.summary: Module size in pixels.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.QuietZone
items.summary: Quiet zone size in modules.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.TargetSizePx
items.summary: Target output size in pixels (0 = disabled). When set, module size is adjusted to fit this target.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.TargetSizeIncludesQuietZone
items.summary: When true, CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions.TargetSizePx includes the quiet zone.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.ErrorCorrectionLevel
items.summary: Optional error correction level override.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.TextEncoding
items.summary: Optional text encoding override (when set, emits ECI for non-default encodings).

items.title: QrEasyOptions.IncludeEci
items.summary: When true, emits ECI headers for non-default encodings.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.RespectPayloadDefaults
items.summary: When true, payload defaults may override version/ECC settings.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.MinVersion
items.summary: Minimum QR version (1..40).

items.title: QrEasyOptions.MaxVersion
items.summary: Maximum QR version (1..40).

items.title: QrEasyOptions.ForceMask
items.summary: Optional forced mask pattern (0..7).

items.title: QrEasyOptions.Foreground
items.summary: Foreground color.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.Background
items.summary: Background color.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.Style
items.summary: Style preset for PNG rendering.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.ModuleShape
items.summary: Overrides the module shape (when set).

items.title: QrEasyOptions.ModuleScale
items.summary: Overrides the module scale (0.1..1.0).

items.title: QrEasyOptions.ModuleCornerRadiusPx
items.summary: Overrides the module corner radius in pixels.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.ForegroundGradient
items.summary: Overrides the foreground gradient.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.Eyes
items.summary: Overrides eye (finder) styling.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.LogoPng
items.summary: Optional logo PNG bytes (embedded for PNG/SVG/HTML).

items.title: QrEasyOptions.LogoScale
items.summary: Logo size relative to the QR area (excluding quiet zone).

items.title: QrEasyOptions.LogoPaddingPx
items.summary: Padding around the logo in pixels.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.LogoDrawBackground
items.summary: Whether to draw a background plate behind the logo.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.LogoBackground
items.summary: Logo background color (defaults to QR background).

items.title: QrEasyOptions.LogoCornerRadiusPx
items.summary: Logo background corner radius in pixels.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.JpegQuality
items.summary: JPEG quality (1..100).

items.title: QrEasyOptions.IcoSizes
items.summary: ICO output sizes in pixels (1..256). Defaults to common icon sizes.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.IcoPreserveAspectRatio
items.summary: When true, preserves aspect ratio and pads to square for ICO.

items.title: QrEasyOptions.HtmlEmailSafeTable
items.summary: When true, renders HTML using email-safe tables.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrErrorCorrectionLevel
items.summary: QR Code error correction level.

items.title: QrErrorCorrectionLevel.M
items.summary: Medium (~15%).

items.title: QrErrorCorrectionLevel.Q
items.summary: Quartile (~25%).

items.summary: No FNC1 mode present.

items.title: QrFnc1Mode.FirstPosition
items.summary: FNC1 in first position (GS1).

items.title: QrFnc1Mode.SecondPosition
items.summary: FNC1 in second position.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebug
items.summary: Debug visualizations for pixel-based QR decoding.

items.title: QrPixelDebug.RenderPng
items.summary: Renders a debug visualization to a PNG byte array.

items.title: QrPixelDebug.RenderToStream
items.summary: Renders a debug visualization to a PNG stream.

items.title: QrPixelDebug.RenderToFile
items.summary: Renders a debug visualization to a PNG file.

items.title: QrPixelDebug.RenderToFile
items.summary: Renders a debug visualization to a PNG file under the specified directory.

items.title: QrPixelDebug.RenderPng
items.summary: Renders a debug visualization to a PNG byte array.

items.title: QrPixelDebug.RenderToStream
items.summary: Renders a debug visualization to a PNG stream.

items.title: QrPixelDebug.RenderPixels
items.summary: Renders a debug visualization to raw RGBA pixels (no PNG encoding).

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugMode
items.summary: Debug visualization modes for pixel-based QR decoding.

items.title: QrPixelDebugMode.Grayscale
items.summary: Raw grayscale image.

items.title: QrPixelDebugMode.Threshold
items.summary: Threshold map (constant or adaptive).

items.title: QrPixelDebugMode.Binarized
items.summary: Binarized image (black/white).

items.title: QrPixelDebugMode.Heatmap
items.summary: Heatmap of luminance vs threshold.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDebugOptions
items.summary: Options for QR pixel debug rendering.

items.title: QrPixelDebugOptions.Scale
items.summary: Downscale factor applied before analysis (1..8).

items.title: QrPixelDebugOptions.OutputScale
items.summary: Upscale factor for the output visualization (default 1).

items.title: QrPixelDebugOptions.ContrastStretch
items.summary: Apply contrast stretch before thresholding.

items.title: QrPixelDebugOptions.ContrastStretchMinRange
items.summary: Minimum contrast range for stretch (default 40).

items.title: QrPixelDebugOptions.BoxBlurRadius
items.summary: Apply a box blur before thresholding (radius in pixels).

items.title: QrPixelDebugOptions.NormalizeBackground
items.summary: Normalize background gradients using local mean subtraction.

items.title: QrPixelDebugOptions.NormalizeWindowSize
items.summary: Window size for background normalization (odd >= 3).

items.title: QrPixelDebugOptions.AdaptiveThreshold
items.summary: Use adaptive thresholding (local window).

items.title: QrPixelDebugOptions.AdaptiveWindowSize
items.summary: Window size for adaptive thresholding (odd >= 3).

items.title: QrPixelDebugOptions.AdaptiveOffset
items.summary: Offset subtracted from the local mean (0..255).

items.title: QrPixelDebugOptions.Invert
items.summary: Invert black/white classification for binarized/heatmap outputs.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeInfo
items.summary: Diagnostics returned by pixel-based QR decoding attempts.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeInfo.Scale
items.summary: Gets the scale factor applied before decoding.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeInfo.Threshold
items.summary: Gets the binarization threshold (0..255).

items.title: QrPixelDecodeInfo.Invert
items.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the image was inverted.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeInfo.CandidateCount
items.summary: Gets the number of candidate finder patterns detected.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeInfo.CandidateTriplesTried
items.summary: Gets the number of finder triples evaluated.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeInfo.Dimension
items.summary: Gets the decoded module dimension, when available.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeInfo.Module
items.summary: Gets the underlying module-level diagnostics.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeInfo.IsSuccess
items.summary: Gets a value indicating whether decoding succeeded.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeInfo.Confidence
items.summary: Gets a confidence score (0..1) for the decode.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrPixelDecodeOptions
items.summary: Options for pixel-based QR decoding.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.Fast
items.summary: Fast preset (lower accuracy, fewer transforms).

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.Balanced
items.summary: Balanced preset (good default for most images).

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.Robust
items.summary: Robust preset (best accuracy, slower).

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.Stylized
items.summary: Stylized preset (adds aggressive sampling for QR art).

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.Screen
items.summary: Screen preset (budgeted decode for UI capture scenarios).

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithProfile
items.summary: Sets the profile (fast/balanced/robust).

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithMaxDimension
items.summary: Sets maximum dimension (pixels) for QR decoding.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithMaxScale
items.summary: Sets maximum scale to try (1..8).

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithMaxMilliseconds
items.summary: Sets the maximum decode time budget.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithBudgetMilliseconds
items.summary: Sets a hard decode time budget without profile downgrades.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithAutoCrop
items.summary: Enables or disables auto-crop for QR decoding.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithBudget
items.summary: Sets the time+dimension budget in one call.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithoutTransforms
items.summary: Disables rotation/mirroring attempts.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithAggressiveSampling
items.summary: Enables or disables aggressive sampling.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.WithTileScan
items.summary: Enables tile-based scanning for multiple QR codes.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.Profile
items.summary: Speed/accuracy profile (default: Robust).

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.MaxDimension
items.summary:
Maximum dimension (pixels) for decoding. Larger inputs will be downscaled by sampling.
 Set to 0 to disable.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.MaxScale
items.summary: Maximum scale to try when decoding (1..8). Set to 0 to use profile defaults.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.MaxMilliseconds
items.summary: Maximum milliseconds to spend decoding (best effort). Set to 0 to disable.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.BudgetMilliseconds
items.summary:
Hard budget in milliseconds for decoding (best effort), without profile downgrades.
 When set, this is used for internal time budgeting instead of MaxMilliseconds.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.AutoCrop
items.summary: Attempts to auto-crop likely QR regions before decoding (useful for screenshots).

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.EnableTileScan
items.summary: Enables tile-based scanning for multiple QR codes in one image.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.TileGrid
items.summary: Tile grid size for multi-scan (0 = auto, 2..4 recommended).

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.DisableTransforms
items.summary: Disable rotation/mirroring attempts even in robust profiles.

items.title: QrPixelDecodeOptions.AggressiveSampling
items.summary: Enables extra thresholding/sampling passes for stylized or noisy QR codes (slower).

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrPresets
items.summary: Ready-to-use QR presets with safe defaults for common scenarios.

items.title: QrPresets.Otp
items.summary: Preset for OTP payloads (high error correction).

items.title: QrPresets.Wifi
items.summary: Preset for Wi-Fi payloads (more correction for noisy camera scans).

items.title: QrPresets.Contact
items.summary: Preset for contact payloads (more correction for dense payloads).

items.title: QrPresets.Logo
items.summary: Preset for logo overlays (high correction + safe logo defaults).

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrRenderStyle
items.summary: Style presets for easy QR rendering.

items.title: QrRenderStyle.Default
items.summary: Plain, high-contrast QR (recommended).

items.title: QrRenderStyle.Rounded
items.summary: Rounded modules for a softer look.

items.title: QrRenderStyle.Fancy
items.summary: Decorative style with gradients and eye frames.

items.summary: Creates structured append metadata.

items.title: QrStructuredAppend.Index
items.summary: Index of this symbol in the sequence (1..16).

items.title: QrStructuredAppend.Total
items.summary: Total number of symbols in the sequence (1..16).

items.title: QrStructuredAppend.Parity
items.summary: Parity for reassembly (0..255).

items.title: QrStructuredAppend.IsValid
items.summary: Returns true when the values are within the QR structured-append range.

items.title: CodeGlyphX.QrTextEncoding
items.summary: QR text encodings supported for payloads and ECI.

items.summary: ISO-8859-1 (Latin-1).

items.title: QrTextEncoding.Utf8
items.summary: UTF-8.

items.title: QrTextEncoding.Ascii
items.summary: US-ASCII.

items.title: QrTextEncoding.ShiftJis
items.summary: Shift-JIS (JIS X 0208 + halfwidth katakana).
